name: Blackberry Lime Haze
description: Blackberry Lime Haze is a 90% sativa cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze that induces high-energy, clear-headed effects. Sweet lime and peppery spice overlay a subtle mix of honey, berry, and floral notes in a show of Blackberry Lime Haze’s rich terpene profile. Functional creativity coupled with a happy mood make this strain conducive to productive afternoons or an active weekend with friends. Blackberry Lime Haze is a potent medicine for a variety of ailments, some of which include depression, headaches, fibromyalgia, spinal cord injury, multiple sclerosis, fatigue, pain, and spasms. Despite its sativa-leaning genetics, Blackberry Lime Haze grows into dense, chunky buds with a heavy coat of crystal trichomes. Though similar to Blackberry Haze, this phenotype leans more toward its Lime Haze parent in appearance and aroma.
descriptionPlain: Blackberry Lime Haze is a 90% sativa cross between Blackberry and Lime Haze that induces high-energy, clear-headed effects. Sweet lime and peppery spice overlay a subtle mix of honey, berry, and floral notes in a show of Blackberry Lime Haze’s rich terpene profile. Functional creativity coupled with a happy mood make this strain conducive to productive afternoons or an active weekend with friends. Blackberry Lime Haze is a potent medicine for a variety of ailments, some of which include depression, headaches, fibromyalgia, spinal cord injury, multiple sclerosis, fatigue, pain, and spasms. Despite its sativa-leaning genetics, Blackberry Lime Haze grows into dense, chunky buds with a heavy coat of crystal trichomes. Though similar to Blackberry Haze, this phenotype leans more toward its Lime Haze parent in appearance and aroma.

highlightedReviews.text:
Forged in the fires of Mount Doom, set in soil from the garden of Eden and watered with the tears of the baby Jesus, this strain's genetics are unrivaled and unsurpassed from any other sativa I have ever encountered.  With a spicy yet sweet aroma and distinctive (Barney) purple calyxes, this strain is as unique as it is phenomenal.  After vaporizing Blackberry Lime Haze, I wanted to conquer the world and had a positive outlook on life.  

One strain to rule them all, use Leafly to find them, one strain to bring them all, and in the joint we bind them.
Just vaped this sweet smelling bud. Very happy head, a bit euphoric! ğŸ‘ŒğŸ»tastyğŸ

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Hollywood OG, Critical Jack, Blackberry Lime Haze, Jamaican Dream, and White Dragon
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Looking for some new strains to help elevate your weekend plans? Whether you're an indica-lover, a die-hard sativa fan, or somewhere in between, we have recommendations! From Eva Seeds in Spain, we've added the pure indica White Dragon as well as their sativa-heavy Jamaican Dream. Critical Jack is a hybrid that combines the powerhouse indica Critical Mass with Jack Herer, one of the most adored sativa strains to ever bless our stash jars. Blackberry Lime Haze is an amazingly flavorful hybrid that offers a multitude of medical benefits, and allÂ you Californians out there shouldÂ keep an eye out for Hollywood OG, another potent hybrid from the OG family.
Already tried one of these?Â Give it some love by writing a review!
Â  Â 1. Hollywood OG
Characteristics of Hollywood OG:

Indica-dominantÂ hybrid
From southern California
Sweet,Â earthy,Â lemonÂ andÂ dieselÂ aroma
Delivers strong, cerebrally focused effects
May help withÂ pain, tension, andÂ stress

Â  Â 2. Critical Jack
Characteristics of Critical Jack:

Hybrid strain
Cross betweenÂ Critical MassÂ andÂ Jack Herer
Lemon,Â pine, andÂ floralÂ aroma
Light on the body and stimulating to the mind
May help withÂ depression,Â appetite loss, andÂ headaches
Indoor flowering time of 60 days

Â  Â 3. Blackberry Lime Haze

90%Â sativaÂ

SweetÂ lime,Â pepperyÂ spice,Â honey,Â berry, andÂ floralÂ aroma

May help withÂ depression,Â headaches,Â fibromyalgia,Â spinal cord injury,Â multiple sclerosis,Â fatigue,Â pain, andÂ spasms

Â  Â 4. Jamaican Dream

90%Â sativa
Breeder:Â Eva Seeds
Jamaican genetics
Subtle andÂ sweetÂ aroma
CanÂ elevate moodsÂ and bring weightlessÂ euphoria
May help withÂ depressionÂ andÂ fatigue
Indoor flowering time of 42 to 45 days

Â  Â 5. White Dragon
Characteristics of White Dragon:

100%Â indicaÂ 
Breeder: Eva Seeds
Cross betweenÂ Northern LightsÂ and anÂ AfghaniÂ indica
Woody,Â earthy, andÂ spicyÂ aroma
Delivers an immediate wave ofÂ sedatingÂ relaxationÂ and calming lethargy
May help withÂ sleeplessnessÂ andÂ pain
Indoor flowering time of 45 to 50 days
